mapper.insert: insert into hist_avy ( process_inst_id, avy_id, tpl_no, executor_id, class_no, tms, function_id, decision, decision_desc) values ( #{processInstId}, #{avyId}, #{tplNo}, #{executorId}, #{classNo}, #{tms}, #{functionId}, #{decision}, #{decisionDesc} )
mapper.select: select h.process_inst_id as processInstId, b.start_date as startDate, b.end_date as endDate, b.days, p.process_tpcd as processTpcd, b.description from hist_avy h, process_info p, biz_info b where h.process_inst_id = p.process_inst_id and h.process_inst_id = b.process_inst_id and h.executor_id = #{executorId} order by b.start_date desc, b.end_date desc
select count(1) from hist_avy h, process_info p, biz_info b where h.process_inst_id = p.process_inst_id and h.process_inst_id = b.process_inst_id and h.executor_id = #{executorId}
select h.avy_id as avyId, u.username as executorName, h.decision, h.decision_desc as decisionDesc from hist_avy h,user u where h.executor_id = u.user_id and h.process_inst_id = #{processInstId}
mapper.delete: delete from hist_avy where process_inst_id = #{processInstId} and executor_id = #{executorId}
